sentences.sContent: Many families must skimp on their food and other necessities just to meet the monthly rent.
sentences.sCn: 为了交每月的租金，许多家庭不得不节省食物和其他必需品的支出。

synos.tran: 克扣；对…不够用心；舍不得给；少给

trans.tranOther: If you skimp on something, you use less time, money, or material for it than you really need, so that the result is not good enough
